headline: Is It Time To Reconsider Realty Income (O) After Its Recent Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Realty Income is still a solid deal at around US$60.85, you are not alone. Many income focused investors are asking the same question right now. The stock has returned 0.2% over the last 7 days, 8.8% over the last 30 days, 6.2% year to date, 18.9% over 1 year, 5.6% over 3 years and 32.6% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about how much value is already reflected in the price. Recent attention on Realty Income has centered on its role as a large listed...
